Call Type Description: Customer is calling to inquire about a specific product, its features, pricing, and availability. They may also be seeking advice on which product to choose or asking about product comparisons.
Common Inquiries: Product features, Pricing, Availability, Product recommendations

Call Type Description: Customer is calling to track the status of their online or in-store order, including delivery dates, shipping information, and order modifications.
Common Inquiries: Order status, Delivery dates, Shipping information, Order modifications

Call Type Description: Customer is calling to inquire about the return or refund process for a product they are not satisfied with, including return policy, refund timelines, and exchange options.
Common Inquiries: Return policy, Refund timelines, Exchange options, Product replacements

Call Type Description: Customer is calling to inquire about store hours, locations, phone numbers, or other general store information.
Common Inquiries: Store hours, Store locations, Phone numbers, Directions to store

Call Type Description: Customer is calling to report an issue with their payment, such as a declined credit card, or to inquire about their account status, including loyalty program points or rewards.
Common Inquiries: Payment issues, Account status, Loyalty program points, Rewards

Call Type Description: Agent is calling to follow up on a previous customer interaction, such as a purchase or service request, to ensure the customer is satisfied and to offer additional assistance or product recommendations.
Common Inquiries: Customer satisfaction, Product recommendations, Additional assistance

Call Type Description: Agent is calling to schedule an appointment for a customer's home improvement project, including booking a consultation or installation.
Common Inquiries: Appointment scheduling, Consultation scheduling, Installation scheduling

Call Type Description: Agent is calling to inform customers about ongoing promotions, discounts, or special offers, and to encourage them to take advantage of these deals.
Common Inquiries: Promotion details, Discount information, Offer expiration dates

Call Type Description: Agent is calling to collect feedback from customers about their recent experience with the company, including their satisfaction with products and services.
Common Inquiries: Customer feedback, Satisfaction ratings, Improvement suggestions

Call Type Description: Agent is calling to win back customers who have not made a purchase in a while or have expressed dissatisfaction with the company, offering personalized solutions and incentives to retain their business.
